wikitext.*:
'''''bereth''''' is [[Sindarin]] for "queen, spouse" or "supreme, sublime".<ref name=Eldarin>{{PE|Eldarin}}, p. 23</ref>

==Etymology==
From [[Primitive Quendian]] ''barathî''.<ref name=Eldarin />

The early [[Noldorin]] explains it comes from [[root]] [[BARAT|BARATH]].<ref>{{LR|P3}}, entry "BARATH-"</ref>

==Examples==
*''[[Varda|El'''bereth''']]'' = "Queen of Stars"
*''[[Brethil (Sindarin word)|'''breth'''il]]'' = "princess"
*''[[Berúthiel|'''Ber'''úthiel]]''

==Notes==
It is unrelated to root [[BERÉTH]] ("beech, birch"). Also, it doesn't contain the feminine ending ''[[-eth]]''.
